Create project for NuGet Package

Step1. Create Project from File Menu or Solution Explorer Choose NuGetPackageProject.

Step2. Edit NuGetPackage.tt copy files to Package/Content Package/Tools

Step3. Build it.

 your package is create to bin\Debug / bin\Release

 

details.

Your csproj created by this template.  DefaultTargets added Package.

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<Project ToolsVersion="4.0" DefaultTargets="Build; Package" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/developer/msbuild/2003">

Package target defined in bottom of your csproj.

  <Target Name="Package">
    <Exec Command="&quot;$(ProjectDir)NuGet.exe&quot; pack NuGetPackage.nuspec -OutputDirectory &quot;$(OutputPath)&quot; -BasePath &quot;$(ProjectDir)\Package&quot; "
          />
  </Target>

Note:

NuGet.exe is copy of NuGet Command Line Tool. you can get from http://nuget.codeplex.com/releases/view/57303.
